title.narrative: Coastal Embankment Improvement Project - Phase I (CEIP-I)

description.narrative: The project development objectives are to (a) increase the area protected in selected polders from tidal flooding and frequent storm surges, which are expected to worsen due to climate change; (b) improve agricultural production by reducing saline water intrusionin selected polders; and (c) improve the Government of Bangladesh's capacity to respond promptly and effectively to an eligible crisis or emergency.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Audit | Description :BWDB will ensure that audited financial statements are submitted to IDA within 6 monthsafter the end of each fiscal year | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Environment and Social Safeguards | Description :BWDB will implement the project in accordance with the SMRPFand EMF. | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Governance | Description :The Government and BWDB shall carry out the Governance and Accountability Action Plan(GAAP) in accordance with its terms. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Implementation | Description :BWDB will ensure that (i) a Project Steering Committee (PSC); a Project ManagementUnit (PMU); and a Procurement Panel (PP), all with composition, functions and resources satisfactory to IDA are maintainedthroughout the duration of the project. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Quarterly Progress Reports | Description :BWDB will (i) monitor the physical and financial progress of theproject, (ii) analyze the data on key performance indicators; and (iii) prepare and submit quarterly progress reports within 45days following the end of each quarter. | Frequency :Quarterly

title.narrative: Detailed design of future 7 Polders (including EIA, RAP/LAP)
Direct project beneficiaries from increased resilience to climate change
BWDB Person Days of training provided
Length of River Bank Protection Works

target.value: 1.Modelling of the long-term physical processes and other relevant phenomena (subsidence, climate change, river morphology etc.)(scale: macro, meso and micro).2.An investment plan describing a phased polder improvement roadmap for Bangladesh Coast.
